description: Performs static code analysis on repositories using Language Server Protocol (LSP) clients to extract call graphs, class hierarchies, symbol definitions, and package dependencies for supported programming languages.

components.name: Repo
components.description: The source code repository to be analyzed, providing the raw source files as input to the static analysis pipeline.

components.name: Project Scanner
components.description: Scans the repository using Tokei to detect programming languages, calculate code statistics (size, percentage), and determine which LSP servers are needed for analysis. Builds ProgrammingLanguage objects with server configurations.

components.name: LSP Client
components.description: Abstract base class implementing the Language Server Protocol for code analysis. Manages LSP server lifecycle, sends/receives JSON-RPC messages, extracts document symbols, call hierarchies, type hierarchies, and references from source files.

components.name: TS Client
components.description: TypeScript/JavaScript-specific LSP client that extends LSPClient. Handles TypeScript server initialization, workspace configuration, dependency checking (node_modules), and processes tsconfig.json/jsconfig.json files.

components.name: Java Client
components.description: Java-specific LSP client using Eclipse JDT Language Server (JDTLS). Manages JDTLS lifecycle, workspace creation, project import tracking, JDK detection, and handles Maven/Gradle build system configurations.

components.name: Static Analysis Results
components.description: Data structures and utilities for storing and querying analysis outputs. Contains CallGraph (nodes, edges, clustering), StaticAnalysisResults (CFG, hierarchies, dependencies, references per language), and ReferenceResolverMixin for resolving qualified names to source locations.
